question: 1 (h)
statement_html: A particle is moved along the x-axis by a force that measures \(x^{3/2}\)N at a point x m from the origin. How much work is done in moving the particle from the origin to a point \(10\) m away from the origin?
statement_latex:
A particle is moved along the \emph{x}-axis by a force that measures
$x^{3/2}$N at a point \emph{x} m from the origin. How much work is done
in moving the particle from the origin to a point $10$ m away from the
origin?
statement_raw: A particle is moved along the ''x''-axis by a force that measures <math> x^{3/2} </math>N at a point ''x'' m from the origin. How much work is done in moving the particle from the origin to a point <math> 10 </math> m away from the origin?
